description: Whipped Ass presents Part 1 "Le Dragon Rouge", a Halloween Feature Presentation! Saturnina Von Kaltenbruner, played by Mona Wales, is a rare book collector perpetually stuck in her expansive mansion from a demonic curse. The only way to break the spell is to procure "Le Dragon Rouge", a one of a kind book said to be written by Lucifer himself. Penny Branch, played by Penny Pax, gets wrapped up in Saturnina's twisted plot to get the book and finds herself seduced and mesmerized by Saturnina's esoteric ways. Lesbian BDSM and bondage, pussy licking, dildo gag, whipping and strap-on are all included!
title: Le Dragon Rouge: A Whipped Ass Halloween Feature Presentation Part 1
